subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: With temperatures reaching into the low 90s, Carl Pettersson shot a six-under-par 64 yesterday, tied for the best round of the day, and was at 13-under 197 after three rounds of the Fry’s Electronics Open in Scottsdale, Ariz. Mark Hensby, who shared the lead until twice hitting into sand traps on No. 18, fell into a tie with Mark Weir for second place, one stroke back.
